content:
Great taste in documentaries!

Now, about that Marvel list... I'd be happy to help you with that! Here's a list of the Marvel Cinematic Universe (MCU) movies and TV shows in chronological order:

**Phase 1:**

1. Captain America: The First Avenger (2011) - Set during WWII
2. Agent Carter (TV series, 2015-2016) - Set in the 1940s
3. Iron Man (2008)
4. The Incredible Hulk (2008)
5. Iron Man 2 (2010)
6. Thor (2011)
7. The Avengers (2012)

**Phase 2:**

1. Iron Man 3 (2013)
2. Thor: The Dark World (2013)
3. Captain America: The Winter Soldier (2014)
4. Agents of S.H.I.E.L.D. (TV series, 2013-2022) - Starts during the events of Captain America: The Winter Soldier
5. Guardians of the Galaxy (2014)
6. Avengers: Age of Ultron (2015)
7. Ant-Man (2015)

**Phase 3:**

1. Captain America: Civil War (2016)
2. Agents of S.H.I.E.L.D. (TV series, 2013-2022) - Continues after Captain America: Civil War
3. Doctor Strange (2016)
4. Guardians of the Galaxy Vol. 2 (2017)
5. Spider-Man: Homecoming (2017)
6. Thor: Ragnarok (2017)
7. Black Panther (2018)
8. Avengers: Infinity War (2018)
9. Ant-Man and the Wasp (2018)
10. Captain Marvel (2019)
11. Avengers: Endgame (2019)
12. Spider-Man: Far From Home (2019)

**Disney+ Exclusive Content:**

1. The Falcon and the Winter Soldier (TV series, 2021) - Set after Avengers: Endgame
2. Loki (TV series, 2021) - Set after Avengers: Endgame
3. Hawkeye (TV series, 2021) - Set after Avengers: Endgame
4. Moon Knight (TV series, 2022) - Set after Avengers: Endgame
5. Ms. Marvel (TV series, 2022) - Set after Avengers: Endgame

Note: This list only includes the MCU movies and TV shows. If you want to include other Marvel properties like the X-Men or Fantastic Four movies, I can provide you with a more comprehensive list.

Let me know if you have any other questions or need further clarification!
